name: Cilantro Garlic Hummus
description: An easy and delicious cilantro garlic hummus. Vegan Gluten-free Nut-free Recipe
recipeIngredient: 15  oz can garbanzo beans  (, washed and drained)
1  dried red chili pepper or 1 teaspoon chili flakes

recipeInstructions.text: In a pan, heat 2 teaspoons of olive oil.
recipeInstructions.name: In a pan, heat 2 teaspoons of olive oil.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the red chili pepper and the garlic cloves to it.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the red chili pepper and the garlic cloves to it.

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the garlic on medium high heat for 5 minutes stirring occasionally.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook the garlic on medium high heat for 5 minutes stirring occasionally.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the garbanzo beans and the spices and mix well. Cook for another 2 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the garbanzo beans and the spices and mix well. Cook for another 2 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Cool the mixture and blend with cilantro leaves and a little water.
recipeInstructions.name: Cool the mixture and blend with cilantro leaves and a little water.

recipeInstructions.text: Sprinkle the remaining olive oil and cayenne pepper before serving!
recipeInstructions.name: Sprinkle the remaining olive oil and cayenne pepper before serving!

keywords: easy recipe, quick recipe, vegan hummus
